episodes.title: British Police Let My Family Honor Kill Me - Nina Aouilk | heretics. 14
episodes.description:
Nina Aouilk lived through one of the worst childhood experiences imaginable, and her family then tried to honor kill her as part of their Punjabi culture. She believes the cops, teachers and social services didn't act because they didn't want to offend her family's culture.   #honorkilling #heretics #trauma 

Donate to Nina's Cause: https://www.justgiving.com/crowdfunding/nina-aouilk
Contact Nina and learn more about her work: https://t.co/slVFRzh2gq
Follow her on X: https://twitter.com/ninaaouilk
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/londonslifecoach

Andrew on X: http://twitter.com/andrewgold_ok
Insta: http://instagram.com/andrewgold_ok
Support on Locals: http://andrewgold.locals.com/

episodes.title: My Parents Indoctrinated Me…with Scientology - Kelli Copter | Heretics podcast 11
episodes.description:
This is one of the strangest and scariest stories I've ever heard, and gives us an insight into the way kids can be brainwashed and made to feel there is something wrong with them. Kelli Copter was born into a scientology family in the north of England. Her first years as part of the Tom Cruise Hollywood cult (which also has John Travolta and is run by David Miscavige) were absolute hell. She's an absolute heretic, and broke free. #scientology #kellicopter #tomcruise 

Follow Kelli's amazing channel:  @KelliCopter  

Andrew Links:
http://instagram.com/andrewgold_ok
http://twitter.com/andrewgold_ok
https://www.patreon.com/andrewgold
